user.title: Enter device information
user.description:
Details can be found in the main Hue App.

Select the Sync tab and make sure the Philips Hue Play HDMI Syncbox is selected. After that tap the â€¦ menu at the top, select Device and then NetworkInfo for the IP address and DeviceInfo for the Identifier.

progress.wait_for_button: Press and hold the button on the Philips Hue Play HDMI Sync Box for a few seconds until it blinks green to link it.
